bibl.title: Some Trends in Fourth-Century-AD Metropolitan Liturgies.
Proceedings of the XIXth International Congress of Papyrology. II
bibl.author: LENZ, John R.

bibl.note: Looks briefly at metropolitan liturgies, and especially those imposed on the bouleutic class.
LENZ John R., Some Trends in Fourth-Century-AD Metropolitan Liturgies.
Proceedings of the XIXth International Congress of Papyrology. II (Cairo, 1992) pp. 141-151.
